website_summaries.verdict: Simple to use and with great results.
pros: Works as expected and that's a great thing with this particular device
There's no fuss in the setup and with a simple press of a button, you can automate garage controls from your phone
We love that it's supported by free video tutorials as well
cons: Not the sleekest in terms of design and functionality, but does the basic job well

customer_reviews.title: Follow the video Not the quick install guide - Easy install.
customer_reviews.text: Looked at the youtube how to install video from Genie. Installed app and the app guides you step by step (Read and follow each step!). For my garage mounting the control unit above my existing garage opener buttons was the best option. You just have to splice into your existing wiring to the garage opener buttons. You can connect to google assistant. This lets you check on status of your garage doors. Open/Close all garage doors or just the ones you choose. If you have more than one garage door you have to buy another position sensor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very clunky interface with alexa
customer_reviews.text: Yes, easy to install, etc, but when it comes time to use it unfortunately it is easier to press the button than to have a long conversation with Alexa about opening aladdin connect, discussing which door to open, giving a pin number before it opens, yada yada. Really needs to be streamlined into a one sentence command., I want the door to open not to have a long discussion..........
customer_reviews.author: Bradford Butt

customer_reviews.title: Works great, can be slow but overall good.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and works well. There is a bit of a delay when using it, as others have mentioned. It also. Doesn't integrate seamlessly into google. I'd love to tell my phone to open my garage door but at this point that's too simple and it doesn't work. I do believe it will work for any other type of opener as it's hardwired into the main machine, no codes or programming needed. As long as you can access where the wires from the wall unit, then you can use this.
customer_reviews.author: R. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install but also hangs very easily
customer_reviews.text: Installation was very easy, just follow the instructions. One bug in the system is that during remote door operation, if the door is stopped via the wall button or for any other reason, the app will hang in the transition state and there is no way to recover. I spoke to Genie customer support and they confirmed that the only way to recover is to operate the door locally. This isn't a good approach as I have seen the unit fail once or twice to operate the door. This significantly reduces the overall utility of the app.
customer_reviews.author: justacustomer

customer_reviews.title: Goooooood!!!
customer_reviews.text: I finally had time to install this. I watched the installation video before I did it. The video is very clear so I didn’t get any trouble to install it. It works good. A little thing make it not perfect is the delay time between you tap your phone and the opener reacts but I think it’s not a big deal if I don’t need to drive back home to check my garage.
customer_reviews.author: yen

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: It’s sad at a certain point in your life that you just can’t remember things. My husband is developing dementia or Alzheimer’s. We were on holiday in another country when I received a phone call from my dear neighbor to let me know that our garage door had been left open. We had to contact our security company to allow our neighbor inside of our home to close the garage door. We have since had the Genie Aladdin installed and I know now when the door is open and if it’s been closed. A true life saver. Thanks to our good neighbor and Genie Aladdin automatic garage door closers.
customer_reviews.author: Survivor

customer_reviews.title: This does not support remote controls!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This device works well for its designed purpose, but astoundingly to me, it has no support for regular remote controls! Why go to all the work to design this and then leave the most obvious feature out? In fairness, it does not say it supports remotes, but the picture of the small device in the ad and common sense says it should. The small device is actually the door position sensor, not a remote. Of course, newer garage door openers have the remote receiver built into the opener, but older openers may not.
customer_reviews.author: Alan E. Brownell

customer_reviews.title: Great for connecting to Alexa and works fine
customer_reviews.text: Great for connecting to Alexa and works fine when you finally got it ot work. If you use android Samsung S8 to configure it will be very frustrating and it will not work. After I fought with it for an hour, I switch to my IPad (IOS) and it was configure after 3 times! So lesson learn...Also the included wire is too thin so make sure it really goes in deep and pull slightly on it testing it is secure. If not it will not work. After installation it works smoothly. Its nice to be able to open/close my garage from anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: PofC

customer_reviews.title: Good Prouduct One You Figure Out Installation
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered this product to install on my grandmothers garage door since she forgot to close it several times before. We set it to automatically close after 15 minutes of being open. I did have a difficult time with installation as the app would not register the device on my iPhone. I tried another family members iPhone and it worked there so i'm not sure what was going on there. Now that its installed it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy install. Had problems getting the unit connected to my home wifi but was finally able to figure it out. Works great with my Amazon echo Dot and Alexa. Also use it with my Google home mini. Gives me peace of mind knowing I didn't leave home and forget to close the garage door. Also convenient using Alexa to open the door when I'm going to the garage and my hands are full. I have a new home with a Genie model 2510 garage door opener, totally compatible and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Xitment

customer_reviews.title: Slight lag time with app
customer_reviews.text: Straight forward installation on existing genie garage door opener. Follow the step by step instructions or watch the installation video. Install time about 30min. I really like the Aladdin app; it has customizable rules which is a nice feature and of course, the notifications are important to me. I have to mention there is a slight lag time when operating the garage door with the Aladdin app; I assume the delay is with the app going through the WiFi router, then out to the garage to communicate with the Door Control Module.
customer_reviews.author: hexacat

customer_reviews.title: WOrks better than not?
customer_reviews.text: Setting this thing up is 100% painful. I ended up having to log into the unit 192.168.1.1 and it has a gui for wifi setup. Cause the advertised method just did not work! Recent update on app has been a whole lot better recently. It does what it's supposed to. I like to have it so I don't need to carry around extra clicker when out and about. Also sometimes I am terrible at making sure my garage is closed sometimes. Or I panic with a "did I close it?" when 30 minutes+ away from home.
customer_reviews.author: danny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for smart home
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install, easy app to use, and yes you can program it to automatically close after a certain time! Great for busy people not remembering to close ;-). Good feature with the warning signal when closing, very useful. Do remember when programming closing time, you might need the door open for a longer time so set this at a reasonable time, and disable if you need too have it open for longer time. Great post fitting smart device!
customer_reviews.author: bembret

customer_reviews.title: Good hardware, Improved software
customer_reviews.text: If you are tech savvy, this is relatively easy setup. It took me about an hour install and use. The software has improved from the reviews I read. You can control sound notification from the app now. The only problem with the app is if opened from the notification, it doesn't login correct and will not show up to date status. But if the app is opened normally, it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: AMV19

customer_reviews.title: Automated Garage Door opener
customer_reviews.text: I love it, Aladdin Connect was easy to install, and works great. I get a message each time the garage door is opened or closed, I set it to close the garage door after 15 minutes, so it closes in case I forget about it. I am glad I waited this long, because other automated openers in the market over the past two years were not that easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: pacsailor

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a way to monitor/control my garage door remotely, without any fees. This is the winner! No monthly fees for access. Setup WiFi through app on my phone, mounted next to my old garage door opener on the wall, mounted sensor on door, done. If you have basic home improvement / computer skills, you can do this. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Richard M

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with Chamberlain openers
customer_reviews.text: This device was not as intuitive to install as hoped from Aladdin. Once we (tech support and I) did get it talking to the WiFi, I found that while a signal was being sent to the Chamberlain opener, it would not function the opener. Today, I can only determine if the door is open or closed. Aladdin says it's a Chamberlain issue, and vice versa. Shoulda done more homework.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Completely misses the mark
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to install, and the sensor is useful to know what position the door is in. The app on the other hand is terrible. The server seems to go down regularly which automatically logs me out and will then not let me log back in. I've spent many minutes trying to open the door before giving up and going around to the front of the house and opening it manually. I've recently purchased a keychain remote because the app is so unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Could never get this stupid GDO connected or keep it connected. Purchased a range extender as suggested, it is a great product, yet it still could not connect this GDO. Spent much time trying, customer service, online resources. Too bad, I thought it would be easy considering I am a tech. Programmers need to sort this out and provide customers foolproof instructions.
customer_reviews.author: DERIC WRIGHT

customer_reviews.title: Great wifi garage door system
customer_reviews.text: This system works great. Genie put the research into this system and made it easy to install with no issues. Instructions are thorough and it seems to work perfectly for my purposes of being able to open/close a Genie 2700 opener remotely and receive notifications when such events occur. I do wish it had HomeKit capabilities but other than that I would recommend this system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I installed this myself on my only garage door. The facts that I was able to use the existing opener power outlet and mount the unit to the existing opener mounting hardware, and that my wifi signal was strong enough in the garage were a big plus. I did have to make a couple calls to Genie to clarify some steps in the literature, but it works as described and very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: JamzM

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on the opener for my attached garage. It works great with my Marantec opener. I especially like the rules feature. In the past we have forgotten to close the door and left it open all night, now I have a rule that closes the door automatically if it is open between specified times. And I can look at my phone and know if the door is open or closed, and operate it from wherever I am.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory P. Cautrell

customer_reviews.title: App support
customer_reviews.text: I got this last week and installed easily in 2 hours including App,.WiFi and mounting. I faced problem with WiFi setup using Android Phone. The wifi configuration was not successful with multiple attempts and finally I completed with Apple phone. Post completion, Android app works perfectly with that configuration to 2GHz access point. The trouble was Android app not.connecting to Aladdin WiFi access point. Due to this wifi problem, I am giving 4 rating. Note: I initially got MyQ that didn't support Genie model 1028.
customer_reviews.author: Suresh Kalimuthu

customer_reviews.title: Great product, worked great with my Genie opener!
customer_reviews.text: I read all the negative and positive reviews, seems many negatives were about the Aladdin connecting to wifi network, I believe many customers overlook the small note that you may need to turn off mobile data on your phone in the setup process so the unit can properly connect and configure to the home wifi. Physical installation was very simple, connecting two wires and two brackets. The demonstration videos were very good and covered every detail. Unit works as advertised. I can close and open from away from home and set timing features, great to have peace of mind when away from home.
customer_reviews.author: Steve1234567890

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, Just not on Android 9.0 Pie
customer_reviews.text: The install and setup is super easy. The Aladdin control box will not sync to Android 9.0 during the setup. So if you have something like a Samsung S10 or a Google Pixel 3, you will need an older Android to set it up. Once its up and working, you can log into the app on your Android 9.0 device and use it normally. Only need the older version for setup. My only other complaint, is the service is slow around the end of the working day (high volume of users). But for the Average price of $60. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: James K.

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Well like advertised it works with my garage door opener, Alexa, and my smart phones and did not mess up the remote door opener or the door opener itself. It is a great system, receives the signals and opens and closes the door even if you are away from the house. Good to have around and real handy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Murray

customer_reviews.title: Pain to install, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: I had a rough time getting this unit paired with my wifi. It took me about 15 tries and 2 hours to get the two to match up. That being said, the app is pretty decent and the functionality of this unit is pure gold! I would recommend highly to others, but make sure you watch other youtube videos to get the install done.
customer_reviews.author: DivisionBell81

customer_reviews.title: Open and close Garage from any where you are....
customer_reviews.text: Well this is an amazing product but make sure it will work with your unit. Once you have it hooked up to your unit which was easy, down load the app and there you go. if you forget to close your door, it will tell you and you can do it from anywhere you are at as long as your phone is working and your house has wiff.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Alexa users will be frustrated
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and an alexa for my car and can't be more disappointed. you have to go through a bunch of verbal gymnastics just to get your garage door open when using alexa and at the end of the day that button on the remote is just not that hard to push. I will say that using the mobile app for opening and closing the garage door is a nice feature but I could have accomplished that a lot cheaper than what this set up cost. DR
customer_reviews.author: Just Some Guy in Boise

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: After initial connection trouble this unit works well. They need a trouble shooting page for instructions,I spent about 4 hrs trying to pair with my router do to blinking green lights. which is covered in instructions telling you it isn't connected to internet but has no solution. I had to read through reviews to find out you need to delete the controller and reinstall.
customer_reviews.author: Bash

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it will be good
customer_reviews.text: Major complaint was the complexity of the install. Documentation should include data necessary for Tech Support. I had to remove, virtually uninstall, to get at the serial number and square. Am too frustrated to finish at this time will update when I finish install, but not today.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Will Not Connect To WIFI No Matter What Was Tried
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product, but I should have listened to the poor reviews. I encountered many of the set up problems that others' had. But I could not experience first hand the issues with functioning after installation since no matter what was tried, the unit would just not connect to my WIFI. So back it went.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Bennet

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Took a little loner to install then I like due to how my garage is situated. Was easy to setup on my network and get everything connected. Easy to use app and connected to my SmartThings without issue. Using this with my older Lift Master opener.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Poor integration with Webserver
customer_reviews.text: The device was easy to install. When it works, it's also practical. But the software that integrates the app with the Webserver is poorly designed. Every so often I wait minutes for the app to update the garage door status before I can operate the door to open or close. At other times, the app knocks me out of the account and I have to type in again username and password before anything can happen. These issues get pretty annoying after awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Faust Mephisto

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: I found it easy to install, especially when compared to replacing the whole my existing opener with a newer WiFi model. It was a 15-minute job. It has great features including alerts when the garage is opened or closed. I like being able glance at my phone to see if the garage door is open or closed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Levin

customer_reviews.title: Read the policy agreement!
customer_reviews.text: Tried for a few hours to set up. Following steps, going in circles, never successful. Watched a how to You tube video, the person in video, admited not able to set up. He called support twice. I was tempted to call, then happened to read policy agreement. MAKE SURE YOU READ IT. They charge a licencing fee?! I stopped there. This is all to gleen and sell as much of your personal info as possible, and charge you for it. Not to mention product is cumbersum at best.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas DeBoe

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is awesome
customer_reviews.text: We had a little issue with getting it going. No frustration here. We knew we didn't do something right. Call support, very friendly and helpful. Walked my wife through it and stayed on the line until she got it to work. Customer service is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: j allen

customer_reviews.title: It Works. Easy to install without prior experience on fixing garage doors.
customer_reviews.text: Straightforward installation. Had some problems installing the app initially but now it’s all good. Had it for a month now, so far so good. Door position sensor battery is now 2/3 bars. So I guess you’d need to change batteries every 3 months?
customer_reviews.author: Zigster Camembert

customer_reviews.title: It does work as described -  Difficulty was getting it to connect to WIFI
customer_reviews.text: I had to google a solution to the problem with connecting. Once googled - Solution was entering in the generic IP address. Worked and continues to work flawlessly since then. That tidbit should have been added to the instructions or the video
customer_reviews.author: Demar002

customer_reviews.title: Low cost upgrade, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Installing and setting up the WiFi control pad was quite simple if you have a bit of experience with WiFi. I wired mine to my old garage control pad, two screws and it was done. The phone app is easy to use and faster than Alexa. Connecting to Alexa was easy enough but it uses a "Skill" so you have to start the skill, then give instructions on opening or closing the door. This is slow, compared to just saying open the garage door. Overall, I'm quite pleased!
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions to the letter. After install had to wait about 30 minutes before the app starting working. There is a short delay in the app when opening or closing or notifications telling you about the door status which I think is normal. Notifications have worked every time. Installed on a 2003 Genei pro with the simple 1 button opener that I removed and used the existing wires. Couldn't have been any simpler. Btw I have a wifi repeater in my detached garage so no weak signal.
customer_reviews.author: Tim B.

customer_reviews.title: Be patient on the install
customer_reviews.text: Good feature for remote opening. A little more involved than the Genie but does have some advantages to select the door to close after so many hours open in case someone forgets
customer_reviews.author: Vinny A

customer_reviews.title: Work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Only wish remote wall switch had a light switch like the original and it would be perfect. As is, if you want to operate the light, you need to add this unit and still keep the original installed.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Let's you tell if you left the garage door open
customer_reviews.text: Bought to be able to tell if I left the garage door open. You can tell its status from the app. It also keeps a log of when it is opened or closed. It also allows you to open/close the door remotely. I have used it to open the garage door after I have taken a walk.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Great opener at a great price!!
customer_reviews.text: I used the genie to replace the three buttons I had on the wall to open the garages. Simple installation by using the two wires from each button and inserting in the right slots in the back of the genie. Plug it in and get the wifi setup before mounting. I installed the app to my Android and mounted only one garage door opener for the app. Works as advertised! The unit works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Matt M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. No more second Guessing if you shut the door
customer_reviews.text: Set it up and now we can never question did we shut the garage door. We can just check online and shut if not. Saves return trips
customer_reviews.author: Eliza Bushn

customer_reviews.title: Nice product add GOOGLE Home link.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, easy to install and works great with app. Does not work with GOOGLE Home and that is disappointing. This needs to be fixed so the app links with GOOGLE Home.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Install a little tedious, but works!
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy to install as MYQ, but works just as well. I haven't had any issues with this.
customer_reviews.author: LeGene  Lett

customer_reviews.title: Non compatible
customer_reviews.text: Apparently it’s not compatible with my Genie Garage door opener. Not replacing mine for this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeepdude2004

customer_reviews.title: Best door system ever
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I have ever made AladdinConnect keeps me informed of the positions of my door on my phone👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy install and they work great just don’t like having to say Alexa AladdinConnect, then say which door wish it just went off the door name
customer_reviews.author: Evilchef

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: Love this garage door opener and use it everyday it was not too difficult to setup and once it was setup it has beed fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: James Reiter

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your time and money on this. It will disconnect randomly or not sense the sensor and during those times you can’t use the door. Just stick to the normal door remotes.
customer_reviews.author: Blaine Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Teach your old Garage door opener a new trick!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy installation. My 20yr old garage door opener is now “smart”. Very happy with the ability to use smartphone apps, this not leaving a remote in a car outside the garage.
customer_reviews.author: B. D. Kiser

customer_reviews.title: Real time status works well
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as advertised. Pretty straightforward installation as I used an existing wall controller for wiring connections.
customer_reviews.author: rhd

customer_reviews.title: Bad implementation.
customer_reviews.text: WiFi setup absolutely does not work with Android 9. Setup in general is annoying. In the end, with everything setup, the product barely works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Hayabusa

customer_reviews.title: Great product to add to my Genie Garage opener
customer_reviews.text: Great product, fairly simple to install, and works great with my Genie Garage opener.
customer_reviews.author: Geeked Out

customer_reviews.title: Easier than replacing old remotes- iPhone / WiFi is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: The Aladdin connect was easy to install on my older lift master garage door opener. The instructions were good but the YouTube DIY install video was better. This is an excellent alternative to buying and attempting to program new remotes. You know that your iPhone will always be in your pocket and that is now your new remote.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Easy install.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Has worked flawlessly. The app is very easy to set up and use as well. Had none of the WiFi connectivity issues that some of the other reviewers have mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Garthaux

customer_reviews.title: Alexa configuration too complicated
customer_reviews.text: We were not able to control the doors through Alexa. It was way too complicated and we gave up all together. But the doors do work manually and we are happy with that.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: A fair product that needs a software upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I had to call tech support several times during the installation for issues not described in the manual. It took me a couple of days to make it work for a two-door garage. Slow response time of around 10 to 15 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Amazing once set up
customer_reviews.text: If you follow the directions you will love it. Giving this as housewarming gifts to all the customers that buy homes from me.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Item was as described. Fairly easy to install. Installed mine on the ceiling. Seems to be operating as designed. Very pleased with it and it is Alexia compatible.
customer_reviews.author: Donald P.

customer_reviews.title: App doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: Opens the door, so thats great- but the point is for the app to work- and it doesnt
customer_reviews.author: BlueBird

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this opener, you will regret it and have to purchase an alternate product anyway.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this opener kit in January of 2020, it has been non-op for over 70% of the time since. Installation instructions are poor are usually send you to "Call Customer Service" and good luck reaching them. I have finally had enough and am tearing the whole system out.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Makes life easy
customer_reviews.text: Set up was smooth. I powered it up in house before installing becouse peaple said to took time for the software to connect to server and start working but app was working in about 15 minutes. Hardware was easy as well. For the money this is one of the best additions to garage ever
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great invention
customer_reviews.text: Love this can open the door for my son while I am at work.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: User friendly
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, loved the installation video on the Genie website. Works great with the app.
customer_reviews.author: Inés

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Took about 30 minutes to install. Follow the video step by step, DONT skip ahead and you’ll be fine. Works great w/ Alexa Note: Took me a second to realize the sensor goes on the actual garage door not the framing.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Lopez

customer_reviews.title: A must have.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today, easy to install and setup. Love the app features.
customer_reviews.author: M1M2M3

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install! I really enjoy being able to control the door from anywhere and also setting up rules to know when the door is open and to close it if it's open at night. Will be adding a second door to control soon.
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Genie has a very good installation video. Their tech support is spotty at times. Still, outstanding product. Works very well. Still trying to figure out how to link it to my Google Home Mini.
customer_reviews.author: harshad patel

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and easy to use and install.
customer_reviews.author: Manirat phrachanhsay

customer_reviews.title: The Best piece of smart home
customer_reviews.text: The genie Aladdin is a super easy and so far very reliable product. This set up simply to my existing door controller. Took a whole 20 min to setup!
customer_reviews.author: Greg K. 13

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Worked good for the first day then was crap keeps disconnecting every 10 min tried resetting it same issues very unhappy not worth spending the money on it
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Genie makes my life easy
customer_reviews.text: The genie was easy to set up. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Aleida E. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Good product overall
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product sometimes not as quick
customer_reviews.author: Waj

customer_reviews.title: Works after being patient with app set up
customer_reviews.text: Works well after set up. The app set up is s little flaky but once you get through it it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional product
customer_reviews.text: The Aladdin connect by Genie is a great product. I found installing it very easy with no issues, and it has been working great.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Khan

customer_reviews.title: Works well to open the door remotely while for closing it takes approx 2 mins
customer_reviews.text: Good one to open the door remotely... Challenge is the time it takes for closing April 2 mins ...
customer_reviews.author: Prashanth

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Removed standard door switch replaced with this unit. Worked well.

product_meta.title: Genie Aladdin Connect – Smart Garage Door Opener – Compatible with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant - Monitor, Open and Close from Anywhere with a Smartphone (iPhone or Android),(Item Ships in Bag)
product_meta.description: For many homeowners, the garage door is the most used entry point to the home – not to mention the largest. Having up-to-date information about who is accessing your garage at any given time can provide immense peace of mind. And being able to operate your garage door from your smart device is the ultimate convenience! Do both of these and more with Genie’s Aladdin Connect smartphone connectivity. This WIFI garage door opener gives you power over your home by monitoring your garage door’s status at all times. If your garage door is opening or closing, Aladdin Connect will alert you – whether the user is authorized or not. Aladdin Connects Security Advantage is the sensor attached to the garage door itself so if an intruder disengaged your system and manually opened your garage door, you would know about it! Aladdin Connect Smart Phone Connectivity is now even smarter, offering new time-based features. These include creating a virtual key, setting a close time for your door, and setting a time frame within which to close your door. This means you can use your garage door controller to provide temporary or permanent access to friends, relatives or service repair workers. You can also ensure that your door gets closed each night by setting it to automatically close at whatever time you choose. You can also set the door to automatically close after it has been left open for a certain amount of time, giving you peace of mind if you’re already on the road and can’t remember if you closed the garage door or not! Plus, the Aladdin Connect is also now compatible with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant for the ultimate all-around convenience and security. The Genie Aladdin Connect has a free downloadable app, is easy to install and set up, and increases safety by making your garage door smarter and you more aware. Get connected and stay connected with the Aladdin Connect! Your Wi-Fi router must meet this specification: 802.11 b/g/n, 2.4GHz with WPA2 or WPA Security.
feature_bullets: WIFI ENABLED GARAGE DOOR: The Aladdin Connect garage door controller gives you the ability to monitor, open and close your garage door with your smartphone or smart device from anywhere. Also compatible with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.

GET THE SMART SECURITY ADVANTAGE: Using a sensor attached to the garage door, Aladdin Connect monitors the door’s position, allowing you to be alerted when the door opens or closes – electronically or manually.

CONTROL UP TO 3 GARAGE DOORS: One door position sensor comes standard in this smartphone controller kit – but you can monitor up to 3 garage doors with additional door position sensors sold separately.

AUTOMATE DOOR CLOSE TIMES & CREATE VIRTUAL KEYS: Aladdin Connect lets you schedule times to close your garage door as well as close the door after a certain length of time. You can also set up virtual keys for friends, neighbors and relatives!

COMPATIBILE WITH MOST GARAGE DOOR OPENERS: Aladdin Connect works with most brands’ garage door openers manufactured after 1993 (see compatibility list for full details). Compatibility: Your Wi-Fi router must meet this specification: 802.11 b/g/n, 2.4GHz with WPA2 or WPA Security

specifications.Description Pile: Door Position Sensor has a CR2450 3 V Battery
